Chinese.initTips: 初始化环境成功, 按下 %%1 + %%2 + %%3 阅读使用说明, %%4 + %%5 退出程序, %%6,切换语言
Chinese.helperTips: 退出程序请按%%1+%%2, %%3加方向键控制音量和语速, 大小写切换键播报敌人信息,%%4,开启自动提醒,%%5,切换提醒模式,%%6,缩短提醒间隔,%%7,增加提醒间隔, %%8加%%9,保存角色位置, %%10加%%11,传送到保存的位置, %%12,血量信息,%%13,蓝量信息,%%14,异常状态信息, 退出程序请按%%15+%%16
Chinese.tpNotInGameTips: 未进入游戏世界，无法传送
Chinese.tpGameProcessNotExistTips: 未检测到游戏, 毛都获取不到啊

English.initTips: Initialized successful, press %%1 + %%2 + %%3 to read user guide, %%4 + %%5 exit the helper, press %%6 to switch language
English.helperTips: press %%1+%%2 to exit program , %%3+arrow to control volume and speed, capslock to get enemy info,%%4,start auto remind,%%5,switch remind mode,%%6,decrease remind period,%%7,increase remind period, %%8+%%9,save player position, %%10+%%11,teleport to saved position, %%12,HP info,%%13,MP info,%%14,buff info, perss %%15+%%16 to exit the helper
English.tpNotInGameTips: you didn't start the game, can not teleport
English.tpGameProcessNotExistTips: can not find game process, teleport failed
English.gameDetectedTips: game detected, loading the helper program
